Introducing the 
Justia Legal Jobs Newsletter

Justia Launches Newsletter

Welcome to the first issue of the Justia Legal Jobs newsletter. With so many law jobs on offer, choosing the right career for you can seem overwhelming. To make things easier, this newsletter contains a list of available jobs in the legal sector. A couple of notes:

If you apply for one of these jobs, please indicate that you learned about it from Justia.

If your organization, is hiring you can contact us at jobs@justia.com for details on how your job can be included in the next issue.

Feel free to share this newsletter. New subscribers can sign-up at jobs.justia.com

This new service is a work in progress and your feedback is welcome. You may send suggestions to us at jobs@justia.com

Best,
Justia Legal Jobs Team
